remarks: ` F ` takes value 0 between positive and negative values. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Apr-2017.)
statement:
ballotth.m $e |- M e. NN $.
ballotth.n $e |- N e. NN $.
ballotth.o $e |- O = { c e. ~P ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) | ( # ` c ) = M } $.
ballotth.p $e |- P = ( x e. ~P O |-> ( ( # ` x ) / ( # ` O ) ) ) $.
ballotth.f $e |- F = ( c e. O |-> ( i e. ZZ |-> ( ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) i^i c ) ) - ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) \ c ) ) ) ) ) $.
ballotlemfcc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. O ) $.
ballotlemfcc.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. NN ) $.
ballotlemfcc.3 $e |- ( ph -> E. i e. ( 1 ... J ) 0 <_ ( ( F ` C ) ` i ) ) $.
ballotlemfcc.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` C ) ` J ) < 0 ) $.
ballotlemfcc $p |- ( ph -> E. k e. ( 1 ... J ) ( ( F ` C ) ` k ) = 0 ) $.
$d C i k $.
$d F c i $.
$d F i k $.
$d J i k $.
$d M c i $.
$d M i k $.
$d N c i $.
$d N i k $.
$d O c i $.
$d O i k $.
$d i k ph $.
